WorkItem.Description:
Hi,

I'd like to have an option to have the Checkbox "Show online Computers only" checked by Default.

Regards
Norbert
WorkItem.Summary: Feature Request: Show online computers only as default

Comments.Message: Now, each time you change the option "Show online computers only", WPP will remember your choice and the next time you will start WPP, the selection will reflect your last setting.

Hi,

thats great. :) Thanks.

Regards
Norbert
